description: Accell UltraAV Mini DisplayPort to DisplayPort (female) adapter enables the connection of your Mini DisplayPort supported computer to a DisplayPort supported monitor. or other display To use simply insert the Mini DisplayPort (male) end of the adapter to your computer. Next, plug your existing DisplayPort cable from your display into the DisplayPort (female) end of the adapter. Setup is now complete. The Mini DisplayPort to DisplayPort adapter is fully compliant with locking or non-lock DisplayPort cables. Fully DisplayPort Compatible for Optimum Picture Quality. The Mini DisplayPort to DisplayPort adapter supports PC resolutions of up to 2560x1600 and extended color depths of up to 12-bits per component signal. The Mini DisplayPort to DisplayPort adapter is fully compliant with the DisplayPort 1.1 and DPCP (DisplayPort Content Protection) specifications and works with locking or non-lock DisplayPort cables. This adapter is compatible with all computer operating systems and Mini DisplayPort video cards ensuring full compatibility and successful transmission of all video content. UltraAV Adapters Feature Superior Construction. Accell UltraAV Mini DisplayPort to DisplayPort adapter offers superb performance and reliability. Manufactured to the latest DisplayPort specifications, this adapter is engineered using the most advanced cable technology for the highest performance and quality. Features are subject to the capabilities of the computer and graphics solution.
title: Accell B112B-001B UltraAV Mini DisplayPort/DisplayPort(f) Adapter (Black)
